Àtụ:Earthquakes
Ala ọmajiji (nke a makwaara dị ka ala ọmajiji, ịma jijiji ma ọ bụ temblor) bụ ịma jijiji nke elu ụwa nke sitere na ntọhapụ ike na mberede na lithosphere nke ụwa nke na-emepụta ebili mmiri seismic

Ala ọmajiji nwere ike na-esiwanye ike, site na ndị na-esighị ike nke na a pụghị inwe mmetụta, ruo na ndị na-eme ihe ike na-eme ka ihe na ndị mmadụ banye n'ikuku, mebie akụrụngwa dị oke mkpa, na imebi mbibi n'obodo niile
Ọrụ seismic nke mpaghara bụ ugboro, ụdị, na nha nke ala ọma jijiji nwere n'otu oge
Seismicity n'otu ebe dị n'ụwa bụ nkezi ọnụego ntọhapụ ike seismic kwa otu olu
A na-ejikwa okwu ahụ ịma jijiji mee mkpọtụ seismic na-abụghị nke ala ọma jijiji.
N'elu ụwa, ala ọma jijiji na-egosipụta onwe ha site na ịma jijiji na ịkwagharị ma ọ bụ ịkpaghasị ala
Mgbe isi mmalite nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji dị n'ikpere mmiri, enwere ike ịkwaga ala ala nke ọma iji bute mbufịt mbufịt
Ala ọmajiji nwekwara ike ịkpalite mbuze.
N'echiche ya n'ozuzu ya, a na-eji okwu ala ọma jijiji kọwaa ihe omume ọ bụla nke seismic—ma ọ̀ bụ ihe okike ma ọ bụ nke mmadụ kpatara—nke na-ebute ebili mmiri seismic
Ihe na-akpatakarị ala ọma jijiji bụ nbibi nke ebe ọdịda ala kamakwa site na ihe omume ndị ọzọ dị ka mgbawa ugwu, mbuze ala, mgbawa ogbunigwe, na nnwale nuklia
A na-akpọ ebe ala ọma jijiji mbụ gbawara agbawa ya hypocenter ma ọ bụ na-elekwasị anya ya
Ebe etiti bụ ebe dị n'ọkwa ala ozugbo n'elu hypocenter.
Ala ọmajiji tectonic na-eme n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa ebe enwere ike na-agbanwe agbanwe zuru oke iji mee ka mgbaji gbajie n'akụkụ ụgbọ elu nwere mmejọ
Akụkụ nke mmejọ na-agafe ibe ya nke ọma na nke ọma naanị ma ọ bụrụ na enweghị mmebi ma ọ bụ ihe na-adịghị mma n'akụkụ ebe mmejọ ahụ na-abawanye nguzogide esemokwu
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị na-adịghị mma nwere ihe ndị dị otú ahụ, nke na-eduga n'ụdị omume mkpisi aka
Ozugbo ekpochila mmejọ ahụ, ịga n'ihu na mmegharị n'etiti efere ndị ahụ na-eduga n'ịbawanye nchekasị na, ya mere, na-echekwa ike ike n'ime olu gburugburu ebe mmejọ ahụ
Nke a na-aga n'ihu ruo mgbe nrụgide ahụ bilitere nke ọma iji mebie agụụ ahụ, na-enye ohere na mberede na-agafe akụkụ nke mmejọ ahụ, na-ahapụ ike echekwara
A na-ewepụta ike a dị ka ngwakọta nke ebili mmiri seismic na-agbanwe agbanwe na-egbuke egbuke, ikpo ọkụ nke elu ahụ mebiri emebi, na mgbawa nke nkume, si otú ahụ na-akpata ala ọma jijiji
Usoro a nke ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ewulite nsogbu na nrụgide na-akpata site na ọdịda ala ọma jijiji mgbe ụfọdụ na-ezo aka dị ka echiche na-agbanwe agbanwe
A na-eme atụmatụ na ọ bụ nanị pasent 10 ma ọ bụ ihe na-erughị nke ike ala ọma jijiji na-eme ka ike seismic
A na-eji ihe ka ukwuu n'ike ala ọmajiji ahụ na-eme ka ọganihu nke mgbaji ala ọma jijiji ahụ pụta ma ọ bụ ghọọ okpomọkụ nke esemokwu na-ebute

Ya mere, ala ọmajiji na-ebelata ike ngbanwe nke ụwa dị ma welie okpomọkụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na mgbanwe ndị a adịghị emetụta ma e jiri ya tụnyere ihe na-eduzi na convective eruba nke okpomọkụ si n'ime ime ụwa.
Enwere ụdị mmejọ atọ bụ isi, ha niile nwere ike ibute ala ọma jijiji n'etiti: nkịtị, tụgharịa (ntụgharị), na mwepu
Mmejọ nkịtị na nke ọzọ bụ ihe atụ nke mwepu-slip, ebe nchụpụ n'akụkụ mmejọ ahụ dị na ntụzịaka nke itinye na ebe mmegharị na ha gụnyere akụkụ kwụ ọtọ
Ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji na-ebute site na mmegharị na mmejọ ndị nwere akụkụ nke ma mwepu-slip na iku-slip; A maara nke a dị ka oblique slip

Akụkụ kachasị elu, nke na-agbaji agbawa nke eriri ụwa, na slabs dị jụụ nke tectonic plates ndị na-agbada n'ime uwe mwụda na-ekpo ọkụ, bụ nanị akụkụ nke mbara ala anyị nke nwere ike ịchekwa ike na-agbanwe ma hapụ ya na mgbawa
Nkume dị ọkụ karịa ihe dị ka 300 °C (572 °F) na-asọpụta na nzaghachi nrụgide; ha adịghị agbawa na ala ọmajiji
Ogologo oke mgbawa na mmejọ nke eserese (nke nwere ike ịgbaji n'otu mgbawa) dị ihe dịka 1,000 km (620 mi)
Ọmụmaatụ bụ ala ọma jijiji ndị dị na Alaska (1957), Chile (1960), na Sumatra (2004), ha niile dị na mpaghara subduction

Ala ọmajiji kachasị ogologo na-agbawa na mmejọ mpụ, dị ka San Andreas Fault (1857, 1906), North Anatolian Fault in Turkey (1939), na Denali Fault na Alaska (2002), dị ihe dị ka ọkara ruo otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ ogologo oge
Ogologo ya na-ebelata akụkụ efere, na ndị na-adịghị mma na-adị ọbụna mkpụmkpụ.
Mmejọ nkịtị na-abụkarị n'ebe a na-agbatị eriri ahụ dịka oke dị iche
Ala ọma jijiji jikọtara na nkịtị mmejọ bụ n'ozuzu ihe na-erughị ịdị ukwuu 7

Oke ịdị ukwuu tinyere ọtụtụ nkịtị mmejọ bụ ọbụna karịa n'ihi na ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-emi odude tinyere na-agbasa ebe, dị ka Iceland, ebe ọkpụrụkpụ nke kenkuwa oyi akwa bụ nanị banyere isii kilomita (3.7)
mi).
Mmejọ ndị ọzọ na-eme na mpaghara ebe a na-eme ka mkpụkọ ahụ dị mkpụmkpụ dịka n'ókè na-agbanwe agbanwe
Ejikọtara mmejọ ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị dị n'akụkụ oke efere, na ala ọma jijiji kacha ike, ala ọmajiji megathrust, gụnyere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị niile ruru 8 ma ọ bụ karịa
Ala ọmajiji nke Megathrust bụ ihe dị ka 90% nke ngụkọta oge seismic ewepụtara n'ụwa niile.
Mmejọ nke mwepu bụ nnukwu ụlọ ebe akụkụ abụọ nke mmejọ ahụ na-adaba n'ihu ibe ha; oke ngbanwe bụ otu ụdị mmejọ mkpegharị ikuru
Mmejọ mwepu, ọkachasị mgbanwe kọntinent, nwere ike iwepụta nnukwu ala ọma jijiji ruru ihe dị ka nha 8
Mmejọ mwepu na-adaba n'akụkụ kwụ ọtọ, na-ebute oke obosara nke 10km (6.2 mi) n'ime eriri na-agbaji agbaji
Ya mere, ala ọmajiji nke nwere oke karịrị 8 agaghị ekwe omume
Na mgbakwunye, enwere ọkwa nke nrụgide n'ụdị mmejọ atọ ahụ
A na-ebute mmejọ ntinye aka site na nke kachasị elu, mwepu site na etiti yana mmejọ nkịtị site na ọkwa nrụgide kacha ala
Enwere ike ịghọta nke a n'ụzọ dị mfe site n'ịtụle ntụzịaka nke nrụgide kachasị ukwuu, ntụziaka nke ike nke "na-akwali" oke nkume n'oge mmejọ ahụ
N'ihe banyere mmejọ nkịtị, oke nkume na-agbada n'akụkụ kwụ ọtọ, si otú a na-akwali ike (mmetụta kachasị ukwuu) hà nhata nke oke nkume n'onwe ya
N'ihe banyere ịkwanye, oke nkume "na-agbanarị" n'ụzọ nke nrụgide kacha nta, ya bụ n'elu, na-ebuli oke nkume, ya mere, oke ibu ahụ hà nhata nke kachasị mkpa
Mmejọ mwepu bụ etiti n'etiti ụdị abụọ ndị ọzọ akọwara n'elu

Ọdịiche a dị na usoro nrụgide na gburugburu ebe atọ na-adịghị mma nwere ike itinye aka na esemokwu na-adaba na nrụgide n'oge mmejọ, nke na-eme ka ndịiche dị na ike na-egbuke egbuke, n'agbanyeghị agbanyeghị nha.
Maka otu ọ bụla na-abawanye n'ịdị ukwuu, enwere mmụba ihe ruru okpukpu iri atọ na ike ewepụtara
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ala ọma jijiji nke nha 6.0 na-ewepụta ike dị ihe dị ka ugboro 32 karịa ala ọmajiji 5.0 na oke ala ọma jijiji 7.0 na-ewepụta ume ugboro 1,000 karịa ala ọma jijiji 5.0
Ala ọmajiji dị nha 8.6 wetara ike dị ka bọmbụ atọm 10,000 hà ka e ji mee Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ.
Nke a bụ n'ihi na ike a na-ewepụta na ala ọma jijiji, ya mere oke ya, dabara na mpaghara mmebi ahụ nke na-agbawa na nkwụsị nchekasị
Ya mere, ogologo ogologo na ogologo obosara nke ebe ahụ mebiri emebi, na-ebuwanye ibu nke na-esi na ya pụta
Oke kachasị mkpa na-achịkwa oke oke ala ọma jijiji na mmejọ, Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị ogologo oge kachasị dị, ma obosara dị n'ihi na nke ikpeazụ na-adịgasị iche site na ihe dị ka 20
N'akụkụ ọnụ ọnụ efere na-ejikọta ọnụ, akụkụ ntinye nke ụgbọ elu mgbawa dị nnọọ ukwuu
na-emighị emi, ọ na-adịkarị ihe dị ka ogo 10
Ya mere, obosara nke ụgbọ elu dị n'ime oke mgbawa nke ụwa nwere ike ịghọ 50-100 km (31–62 mi) (Japan, 2011; Alaska, 1964), na-eme ka ala ọma jijiji kachasị ike nwee ike.
Ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji tectonic sitere na mgbanaka ọkụ na omimi na-agaghị agafe iri kilomita

A na-ekewa ala ọmajiji nke na-eme na omimi ihe na-erughị 70 km (43 mi) dị ka ala ọmajiji “na-emighị emi, ebe ndị nwere omimi dị n'etiti 70 na 300 km (43 na 186 mi) na-akpọkarị "mid-focus" ma ọ bụ ala ọma jijiji "etiti-n'etiti"

Na mpaghara mwepu, ebe eriri oke osimiri na nke ochie na oyi na-agbada n'okpuru efere tectonic ọzọ, ala ọma jijiji nwere nlebara anya nwere ike ime na omimi ka ukwuu (site na 300 ruo 700 km (190 ruo 430 mi))
Mpaghara ndị a na-arụsi ọrụ ike nke nbibi ka a maara dị ka mpaghara Wadati–Benioff
Ala ọmajiji lekwasịrị anya miri emi na-eme na omimi ebe lithosphere e wedara ala ekwesịghịzi ịdị na-akụkụ, n'ihi oke okpomọkụ na nrụgide
Usoro enwere ike maka ọgbọ nke ala ọma jijiji na-elekwasị anya na-emebi emebi site na olivine na-eme mgbanwe nke oge n'ime usoro ọkpụkpụ azụ.
Ala ọmajiji na-emekarị na mpaghara ugwu mgbawa ma na-ebute ya, ma site na mmejọ tectonic na mmegharị nke magma na ugwu mgbawa
Ala ọmajiji ndị dị otú ahụ pụrụ ịbụ ịdọ aka ná ntị mbụ nke mgbawa ugwu mgbawa, dị ka n’oge mgbawa nke Ugwu St
Helens nke 1980
Oke oke ala ọma jijiji nwere ike bụrụ akara maka ebe magma na-eru na ugwu mgbawa niile
Enwere ike ịdekọ swarms ndị a site na seismometers na tiltmeters (ngwaọrụ na-atụ mkpọda ala) ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ihe mmetụta iji buru amụma na-abịa ma ọ bụ na-abịa.
Ala ọmajiji tectonic na-amalite dị ka mpaghara nke mbụ na-adaba n'elu mmejọ nke na-etolite elekwasị anya
Ozugbo a malitere mgbawa ahụ, ọ na-amalite ịgbasa na-elekwasị anya, na-agbasa n'akụkụ ebe mmejọ ahụ
Mgbasa n'akụkụ ga-aga n'ihu ruo mgbe mgbawa ahụ ruru ihe mgbochi, dị ka njedebe nke akụkụ mmejọ, ma ọ bụ mpaghara na mmejọ ebe enweghị nchekasị zuru oke iji kwe ka nkwụsịtụ na-aga n'ihu
Maka nnukwu ala ọma jijiji, oke omimi nke mgbawa ga-amachibido ala site na mpaghara mgbanwe na-agbaji ductile na elu site n'elu ala

Aghọtachaghị usoro nke usoro a n'ihi na ọ na-esiri ike ịmegharị mmegharị ngwa ngwa dị otú ahụ na ụlọ nyocha ma ọ bụ idekọ ebili mmiri seismic dị nso na mpaghara nucleation n'ihi mmegharị ala siri ike.
N'ọtụtụ oge, ọsọ mgbawa na-abịaru nso, mana ọ naghị agafe, oke ebili mmiri (S-wave) nke nkume gbara ya gburugburu
Enwere mpụ ole na ole na nke a:
Amara mgbawa nke ala ọma jijiji nwere ike gbasaa n'ọsọ karịa ọsọ S-wave
A na-ahụta ihe ndị a niile n'oge nnukwu mmemme mpụ
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ mpaghara mbibi a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ala ọmajiji Kunlun nke afọ 2001 kpatara n'ihi mmetụta nke ụda ụda ụda malitere na ala ọmajiji dị otú ahụ.
Njiji ala ọmajiji ji nwayọ na-aga n'ọsọ dị ala na-adịghị ahụkebe

A karịsịa dị ize ndụ ụdị ngwa ngwa ala ọma jijiji bụ mbufịt mbufịt, hụrụ ebe dịtụ ala chere intensities, mere site ngwa ngwa propagation ọsọ nke ụfọdụ oké ala ọma jijiji, na-adịghị njikere bi na agbata obi n'ụsọ oké osimiri, dị ka na 1896 Sanriku ala ọma jijiji.
N'oge ala ọma jijiji, okpomọkụ dị elu nwere ike ịmalite n'ụgbọelu kpatara, na-abawanye nrụgide pore na ya mere vaporation nke mmiri ala dị n'ime nkume

Na oge coseismic, mmụba dị otú ahụ nwere ike imetụta evolushọn na ọsọ ọsọ, na post-seismic, ọ nwere ike ijikwa usoro Aftershock n'ihi na, mgbe isi ihe mere, nrụgide pore ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-agbasa n'ime netwọk mgbawa gburugburu
Site n'echiche nke Mohr-Coulomb ike tiori, mmụba nke nrụgide mmiri na-ebelata nrụgide nkịtị na-eme na ụgbọ elu na-ezighị ezi nke na-ejide ya, na mmiri mmiri nwere ike ịmepụta mmetụta mmanụ
Dị ka thermal overpressurization nwere ike inye nzaghachi dị mma n'etiti slips na ike ịdaba n'ụgbọelu kpatara, echiche a na-ahụkarị bụ na ọ nwere ike ime ka usoro mmebi ahụ dịkwuo elu

Mgbe mainshock gasịrị, gradient nrụgide n'etiti ụgbọ elu mmejọ na nkume agbata obi na-eme ka mmiri na-asọ asọ nke na-eme ka nrụgide pore dị na netwọk mgbawa gburugburu; Mmụba dị otú ahụ nwere ike ịkpalite usoro mmejọ ọhụrụ site n'ịmeghachi mmejọ ndị dị n'akụkụ, na-ebuli elu ala ọma jijiji
N'otu aka ahụ, mmụba nrụgide pore artificial, site na ịgbanye mmiri n'ime eriri ụwa, nwere ike ịkpata seismicity.
Imiri mmiri nwere ike ịkpalite seismicity.
Ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji na-etolite akụkụ nke usoro, metụtara ibe ha n'usoro ọnọdụ na oge
Ọtụtụ ụyọkọ ala ọma jijiji nwere obere ịma jijiji nke na-akpata ntakịrị ihe na-emebi emebi, mana enwere echiche na ala ọma jijiji nwere ike ịmaliteghachi n'usoro mgbe niile
A hụla ụyọkọ ala ọma jijiji, dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Parkfield, California ebe a na-eme nyocha nyocha ogologo oge gburugburu ụyọkọ ala ọma jijiji nke Parkfield.
Ujo n'azụ bụ ala ọmajiji nke na-eme mgbe ala ọma jijiji gara aga, nke bụ isi

Mgbanwe ngwa ngwa nke nrụgide n'etiti okwute, na nrụgide sitere na ala ọma jijiji mbụ bụ isi ihe na-akpata ọdachi ndị a na-eme n'azụ, yana eriri gburugburu ụgbọ elu mebiri emebi ka ọ na-agbanwe na mmetụta nke mainshock
Ọdachị ọdị n’otu mpaghara dị ka ihe na-awụ akpata oyi n’ahụ mana ọ na-adịkwa obere obere, n’agbanyeghị, ha ka nwere ike ịdị ike nke ga-emebi ụlọ ndị mebiri emebi na mbụ site na nnukwu ihe mberede
Ọ bụrụ na ujo dị n'azụ toro ibu karịa nke mbụ, a na-emegharị shock a ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe mbụ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịma jijiji mbụ dị ka ihe atụ
A na-etolite ebili mmiri mgbe a na-akpụ akpụ n'akụkụ ụgbọ elu mmejọ a chụpụrụ na-adaba na mmetụta nke ihe mberede ahụ.
Oke oke ala ọma jijiji bụ usoro ala ọma jijiji na-adaba n'otu mpaghara n'ime obere oge

Ha dị iche na ala ọma jijiji na-esochi usoro nke mbịambịa na-esote site n'eziokwu na ọ dịghị otu ala ọma jijiji n'usoro bụ isi ihe na-awụ akpata oyi, n'ihi ya, ọ dịghị onye nwere nnukwu nnukwu ịdị elu karịa nke ọzọ
Ihe atụ nke oke oke ala ọma jijiji bụ ọrụ 2004 na Yellowstone National Park
N'August 2012, oke oke ala ọma jijiji kwara na Southern California's Imperial Valley, na-egosi ọrụ ndekọ kacha edekọ na mpaghara ahụ kemgbe 1970s.

Mgbe ụfọdụ, ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji na-eme n’ihe a na-akpọ oké ifufe, bụ́ ebe ala ọma jijiji na-enwe mmejọ n’ụyọkọ, nke ọ bụla na-akpata site n’ịma jijiji ma ọ bụ nrụgide nkesagharị nke ala ọmajiji gara aga
Yiri ala ọma jijiji ma n'akụkụ akụkụ nke mmejọ, oké ifufe ndị a na-eme n'ime ọtụtụ afọ, na ụfọdụ n'ime ala ọma jijiji mechara mebie dị ka nke mbụ

A hụrụ ụkpụrụ dị otú ahụ n'usoro nke ihe dị ka ala ọma jijiji iri na abụọ nke dakwasịrị n'Ebe Ugwu Anatolian Fault na Turkey na narị afọ nke 20 ma bụrụkwa nke a tụlere maka ụyọkọ nnukwu ala ọma jijiji na Middle East.
Ma jijiji nke ụwa bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị nke ụmụ mmadụ na-enwe kemgbe
Tupu mmepe nke ngwa ngwa ngwa ngwa siri ike, a na-eme atụmatụ ike nke ihe omume seismic dabere na mmetụta ndị a hụrụ
Oke na ike adịghị emetụta ma gbakọọ site na iji ụzọ dị iche iche
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ala ọma jijiji bụ otu uru nke na-akọwa nha ala ọma jijiji ahụ n'isi ya
Ike bụ ihe ịma jijiji n'ebe dị iche iche gburugburu ala ọmajiji ahụ
Ụkpụrụ ike siri ike na-adịgasị iche site n'otu ebe ruo ebe, dabere n'ebe dị anya site na ala ọma jijiji na nkume dị n'okpuru ya ma ọ bụ etemeete ala.
Ọkpụrụkpụ nke mbụ maka ịlele oke ala ọma jijiji bụ nke Charles Francis Richter mepụtara na 1935
Akara ndị na-esote (lee seismic magnitude scales) ejirila akụkụ dị mkpa, ebe nkeji ọ bụla na-egosipụta ọdịiche okpukpu iri na njupụta nke ala ịma jijiji na 32- mpịachi dị iche na ume
A na-edozikwa akpịrịkpa ndị na-esote ka ọ nwee ihe dị ka otu uru ọnụọgụ n'ime oke nha.

Ọ bụ ezie na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-akọkarị oke ala ọmajiji dị ka “Richter magnitude” ma ọ bụ “Richter scale”, ụkpụrụ omume nke ọtụtụ ndị ọchịchị seismological na-eme bụ igosipụta ike ala ọmajiji dị n'ogo dị ugbu a, nke dabere n'ike n'ezie nke ala ọma jijiji wepụtara.
A na-eme atụmatụ na ihe dị ka ala ọma jijiji 500,000 na-eme kwa afọ, nke a na-eji ngwa ugbu a chọpụta
Ihe dị ka 100,000 n'ime ndị a nwere ike imetụ ya aka

Obere ala ọma jijiji na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile gburugburu ụwa na ebe dị ka California na Alaska na U.S., yana El Salvador, Mexico, Guatemala, Chile, Peru, Indonesia, Philippines, Iran, Pakistan, Azores na Portugal, Turkey, New Zealand, Greece, Italy, India, Nepal, na Japan
Nnukwu ala ọma jijiji na-eme obere oge, mmekọrịta ahụ na-ebuwanye ibu; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ihe dị ka ala ọma jijiji ji okpukpu iri buru ibu karịa nke 4 na-eme n'otu oge karịa ala ọma jijiji karịa oke 5
Na (obere seismicity) United Kingdom, dịka ọmụmaatụ, a gbakọọ na nkezi nlọghachite bụ:
Ala ọmajiji nke 3.7–4.6 kwa afọ, ala ọmajiji nke 4.7–5.5 kwa afọ 10, na ala ọmajiji nke 5.6 ma ọ bụ karịa kwa otu narị afọ
Nke a bụ ọmụmaatụ nke iwu Gutenberg-Richter.
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri seismic amụbawo site n'ihe dị ka 350 na 1931 ruo ọtụtụ puku mmadụ taa
N'ihi ya, a na-akọ ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji karịa ka ọ dị n'oge gara aga, ma nke a bụ n'ihi mmụba dị ukwuu na ngwá ọrụ, karịa mmụba nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ala ọma jijiji

Nnyocha nyocha nke ala United States (USGS) na-eme atụmatụ na, kemgbe 1900, enweela nkezi nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji 18 (oke 7.0–7.9) na otu nnukwu ala ọma jijiji (oke 8.0 ma ọ bụ karịa) kwa afọ, yana na nkezi nke a adịla mma
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji kwa afọ ebelatala, ọ bụ ezie na nke a nwere ike ịbụ mgbanwe ọnụ ọgụgụ karịa usoro usoro
Ọnụọgụ zuru ezu gbasara nha na ugboro ole ala ọma jijiji dị site na nyocha ala ala United States
Achọpụtala mmụba na nso nso a n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji, nke enwere ike ịkọwa site na usoro cyclical nke oge ọrụ tectonic siri ike, jikọtara ya na ogologo oge nke ike dị ala
Otú ọ dị, ndekọ ziri ezi nke ala ọma jijiji malitere na mmalite 1900s, ya mere ọ dị oke n'oge ikwupụta nke ọma na nke a bụ ikpe.

Ọtụtụ n'ime ala ọma jijiji nke ụwa (90%, na 81% nke ndị kasị ibu) na-ewere ọnọdụ n'ogologo 40,000 kilomita (25,000 mi), mpaghara nwere akpụkpọ ụkwụ inyinya a na-akpọ eriri seismic sekim-Pacific, nke a maara dị ka mgbanaka Pacific mgbanaka
nke n'ọtụtụ akụkụ na-ejikọta Plate Pacific
Nnukwu ala ọma jijiji na-emekarị n'akụkụ oke ala ndị ọzọ, dị ka n'akụkụ ugwu Himalaya.

Ebe nnukwu obodo ndị dị ka Mexico City, Tokyo, na Tehran na-eto ngwa ngwa n’ebe ndị nwere nnukwu ihe ize ndụ nke seismic, ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na-adọ aka ná ntị na otu ala ọma jijiji pụrụ igbu ihe ruru nde mmadụ atọ.
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ ala ọma jijiji na-akpata site na mmegharị nke tectonic plates nke ụwa, ọrụ mmadụ nwekwara ike ime ka ala ọma jijiji

Ihe omume ma n'elu ala ma nke dị n'okpuru nwere ike ịgbanwe nrụgide na nsogbu dị na eriri, gụnyere ebe nchekwa nchekwa, ịwepụta akụrụngwa dị ka coal ma ọ bụ mmanụ, na ịgbanye mmiri mmiri n'okpuru ala maka mkpofu ma ọ bụ mkpọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ala ọma jijiji ndị a nwere obere nha

A na-eche na ọ bụ oke ala ọmajiji Oklahoma 5.7 2011 kpatara na ọ bụ n'iwepụ mmiri mkpofu sitere na mmanụ a na-emepụta n'ime olulu mmiri injection, na nchọpụta na-arụtụ aka na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ nke steeti ahụ dịka ihe kpatara ala ọma jijiji ndị ọzọ na narị afọ gara aga
Otu akwụkwọ Mahadum Columbia tụrụ aro na 8.0 magnitude 2008 Sichuan kpatara ala ọma jijiji site na ibunye site na ọdụ mmiri Zipingpu, ọ bụ ezie na egosipụtabeghị njikọ ahụ n'ụzọ zuru ezu.
Ihe eji eme ihe iji kọwaa oke ala ọma jijiji malitere na Richter magnitude scale na 1930s
Ọ bụ ihe dị mfe iji tụọ oke ihe omume, ojiji ya aghọwokwa obere na narị afọ nke 21
Ebili mmiri na-eme ka ala ọma jijiji na'ime ụwa ma nwee ike idekọ ya site na seismometers n'ebe dị anya
E mepụtara oke ebili mmiri n'elu n"afọ ndị 1950 dị ka ụzọ isi tụọ ala ọma jijiji dịpụrụ adịpụ na imeziwanye izi ezi maka ihe omume ndị buru ibu
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọnụọgụ nke oke ala ọma jijiji ahụ na-atụle oke nke mgbagwoju anya kamakwa ọ na'uche oge alaeze (ebe mgbawa zuru oke, nkezi nke mmebi ahụ, na nkwụsi ike nke nkume ahụ)
Nchịkọta nke ike ala ọma jijiji nke Japan, n'usoro MedvedevīSponheuerī Karnik, na nlekota nke Mercalli dabere na mmetụta ndị a hụrụ ma nwee njikọ na ike nke ịma jijizi.
Ala ọmajiji ọ bụla na-emepụta ụdị ebili mmiri seismic dị iche iche, nke na-aga site na nkume dị iche iche:
Ọsọ mgbasa nke ebili mmiri seismic site na nkume siri ike sitere na ihe ruru
3 km/s (1.9 mi/s) ruo 13 km/s (8.1 mi/s), dabere na njupụta na ngbanwe nke ọkara
N'ime ime ụwa, ujo-ma ọ bụ P-ebili mmiri na-aga ngwa ngwa karịa ebili mmiri S (ihe dị ka njikọ 1.7:1)
Ọdịiche dị n'oge njem site na etiti etiti ruo n'ihe nleba anya bụ ihe nleba anya dị anya ma enwere ike iji were were onyonyo ma isi mmalite nke ala ọma jijiji na ihe dị n'ime ụwa
Ọzọkwa, enwere ike ịgbakọ omimi nke hypocenter nke ọma.
Ala nke dị n'elu na sedimenti anaghị agbakọba: 2–3 km (1.2–1.9 mi) kwa nkeji
Nkume siri ike nke elu elu: 3–6 km (1.9–3.7 mi) kwa nkeji
Nkịta dị ala: 6–7 km (3.7–4.3 mi) kwa nkeji
Mgbochi dị omimi: 13 km (8.1 mi) kwa nkeji.
Igwe ọkụ: 2–3 km (1.2–1.9 mi) kwa nkeji nkeji
Nri ala:4–5 km (2.5–3.1 mi) kwa nkeji
Mgbochi dị omimi: 7 km (4.3 mi) kwa nkeji
N'ihi ya, ebili mmiri mbụ nke ala ọma jijiji dị anya rutere n'ebe a na-ekiri ihe site na mkpuchi ụwa.
Ná nkezi, kilomita anya na ala ọma jijiji bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke sekọnd n'etiti P- na S-ebili mmiri ugboro 8
Obere deviations na-mere site inhomogeneities nke subsurface Ọdịdị
Site na nyocha dị otú ahụ nke seismograms, isi ụwa dị na 1913 site n'aka Beno Gutenberg.
S-waves na emesịa bịarutere ebili mmiri elu na-eme ọtụtụ mmebi ma e jiri ya tụnyere P-ebili mmiri
P-ebili mmiri na-amanye ma gbasaa ihe ahụ n'otu ụzọ ha na-aga, ebe S-ebili mmiri na-ama jijiji ala elu na ala na azụ na azụ.
Ọ bụghị nanị na a na-ahazi ala ọma jijiji site n'ịdị ukwuu ha kamakwa ebe ọ na-eme
E kewara ụwa n'ime mpaghara 754 Flinn-Engdahl (mpaghara F-E), nke dabere na ókèala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mpaghara yana ọrụ seismic
A na-ekewa mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara F-E pere mpe ebe mpaghara ndị na-adịghị arụ ọrụ bụ nke mpaghara F-E buru ibu.

Nkọwa ọkọlọtọ nke ala ọma jijiji na-agụnye ịdị ukwuu ya, ụbọchị na oge ihe mere, nhazi mpaghara nke etiti ya, omimi nke ebe etiti, mpaghara mpaghara, ebe dị anya na ebe ndị mmadụ, ọnọdụ ejighị n'aka, ọtụtụ paramita nke gụnyere na akụkọ USGS ala ọma jijiji (ọnụọgụ ụlọ ọrụ na-akọ akụkọ
, ọnụọgụ nlebanya, wdg), yana NJ mmemme pụrụ iche.

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ejikarị ebili mmiri seismic dị ntakịrị iji chọpụta ala ọma jijiji, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ghọtara na 2016 na nha ndọda nwere ike inye nchọpụta ozugbo nke ala ọma jijiji, wee kwado nke a site n'ịtụle ihe ndekọ ndọda ndị metụtara ala ọma jijiji 2011 Tohoku-Oki ("Fukushima").
Mmetụta nke ala ọma jijiji gụnyere, mana ọ bụghị nanị, ihe ndị a:
Ịma jijiji na mgbawa ala bụ mmetụta bụ isi nke ala ọma jijiji na-emepụta, na-ebutekarị mmebi nke ụlọ na ihe ndị ọzọ siri ike

Ogo mmetụta mpaghara na-adabere na nchikota mgbagwoju anya nke oke ala ọma jijiji ahụ, ebe dị anya site na ebe etiti, na ọnọdụ ala na geomorphological mpaghara, nke nwere ike ịkwalite ma ọ bụ belata mgbasa nke ebili mmiri
A na-atụle ịma jijiji nke ala site na osooso ala.
Ụdị ọdịdị ala ala, geomorphological, na geostructural pụrụ iche nwere ike ime ka ịma jijiji dị elu n'elu ala ọbụna site na ala ọma jijiji dị obere
A na-akpọ mmetụta a saịtị ma ọ bụ nkwalite mpaghara

Ọ bụ n'ụzọ bụ isi n'ihi mbufe ngagharị nke seismic site na ala miri emi siri ike gaa na ala dị nro na mmetụta nke itinye uche n'ike seismic n'ihi ọnọdụ geometric a na-ahụkarị nke nkwụnye ego dị otú ahụ.
Mgbawa nke ala bụ ihe a na-ahụ anya na-agbaji na nchụpụ nke elu ụwa n'akụkụ akara nke mmejọ ahụ, nke nwere ike ịdị n'usoro nke ọtụtụ mita n'ihe gbasara nnukwu ala ọma jijiji

Mgbawa nke ala bụ nnukwu ihe ize ndụ maka nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ injinia dị ka mmiri mmiri, àkwà mmiri, na ọdụ ike nuklia na-achọ nlezianya anya maka mmejọ ndị dị ugbu a iji chọpụta ihe ọ bụla nwere ike imebi ala n'ime ndụ nke ihe owuwu ahụ.
Mmanya nke ala na-eme mgbe, n'ihi ịma jijiji, ihe granular nke mmiri juputara (dị ka aja) na-efunahụ ike ya nwa oge wee gbanwee site na ihe siri ike gaa na mmiri mmiri
Mmanya mmiri nke ala nwere ike ime ka ihe owuwu siri ike, dị ka ụlọ na àkwà mmiri, gbadaa ma ọ bụ mikpuo n'ime ebe nchekwa mmiri juru
Dị ka ihe atụ, n’ala ọma jijiji mere n’Alaska n’afọ 1964, mmiri ara ehi mere ka ọtụtụ ụlọ mikpuo n’ala, mechaa dakwasị onwe ha.
Mmebi anụ ahụ sitere na ala ọmajiji ga-adịgasị iche dabere na oke ịma jijiji na mpaghara enyere yana ụdị ndị bi na ya
Obodo ndị na-erughị eru na ndị na-emepe emepe na-enwekarị mmetụta dị njọ karịa (ma na-adịte aka) site na ihe omume seismic ma e jiri ya tụnyere obodo mepere emepe nke ọma
Mmetụta nwere ike ịgụnye:
Site na mmetụta ndị a na ndị ọzọ, ihe ga-esi na ya pụta nwere ike iweta ọrịa, enweghị ihe ndị dị mkpa, nsonaazụ nke uche dị ka ụjọ ụjọ, na ịda mbà n'obi nye ndị lanarịrịnụ, na ụgwọ mkpuchi dị elu
Oge mgbake ga-adịgasị iche dabere n'ogo mmebi yana ọnọdụ akụ na ụba nke obodo ahụ metụtara.
Ala ọmajiji nwere ike ibute enweghị mkpọda nke na-eduga na mbuze, nnukwu ihe egwu gbasara ala
Ihe egwu nbibi nwere ike ịdịgide mgbe ndị ọrụ mberede na-anwa ọrụ nnapụta.
Ala ọmajiji nwere ike ịkpata ọkụ site n'imebi ọkụ eletrik ma ọ bụ eriri gas
Ọ bụrụ na isi mmiri na-agbawa ma kwụsịkwa nrụgide, ọ pụkwara isi ike ịkwụsị mgbasa ọkụ ozugbo ọ malitere
Dị ka ihe atụ, ọ bụ ọkụ kpatara ọtụtụ ndị nwụrụ n’ala ọma jijiji San Francisco na 1906 karịa ala ọmajiji ahụ n’onwe ya.
Tsunamis bụ ebili mmiri dị ogologo ogologo, ogologo oge nke nnukwu mmiri na-ebugharị na mberede ma ọ bụ na mberede—gụnyere mgbe ala ọma jijiji mere n'oké osimiri
N'ime oke osimiri mepere emepe, anya dị n'etiti oghere ebili mmiri nwere ike gafere 100 kilomita (62 mi), na oge ifegharị nwere ike ịdị iche site na nkeji ise ruo otu elekere
Ụdị mbufịt ndị dị otú ahụ na-aga 600–800 kilomita kwa elekere (kilomita 373–497 kwa elekere), dabere na omimi mmiri
Nnukwu ebili mmiri nke ala ọma jijiji ma ọ bụ mbuze ụgbọ mmiri na-emepụta nwere ike ịfefe mpaghara dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'ime nkeji ole na ole
Tsunamis nwekwara ike ịga ọtụtụ puku kilomita gafee oke osimiri mepere emepe wee bibie mbibi n'ikpere mmiri dị anya awa ole na ole ka ala ọma jijiji mechara.
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, ala ọma jijiji nbibi n'okpuru oke 7.5 adịghị akpata mbufịt mbufịt, ọ bụ ezie na edekọwo ụfọdụ nke a
Ọ bụ ala ọmajiji ruru 7.5 ma ọ bụ karịa na-ebute ọtụtụ mbufịt mbufịt na-emebi emebi.
Iju mmiri nwere ike ịbụ mmetụta nke abụọ nke ala ọma jijiji ma ọ bụrụ na ihe mgbochi mmiri mebiri emebi
Ala ọmajiji nwere ike ime ka egbugbere ọnụ mebie osimiri, nke na-ada ma bute idei mmiri.

Ala dị n'okpuru ọdọ mmiri Sarez dị na Tajikistan nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke idei mmiri dị egwu ma ọ bụrụ na mmiri mgbochi ala nke ala ọma jijiji ahụ, nke a maara dị ka Usoi Dam, ga-ada n'oge ala ọma jijiji n'ọdịnihu
Atụmatụ mmetụta na-egosi na iju mmiri ahụ nwere ike imetụta ihe ruru nde mmadụ ise.
Otu n'ime ala ọma jijiji kachasị njọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme edere bụ ala ọma jijiji Shaanxi 1556, nke mere na 23 Jenụwarị 1556 na Shaanxi, China
Ihe karịrị mmadụ 830,000 nwụrụ
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ụlọ ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ bụ yaodongs—ebe obibi ndị e si n'akụkụ ugwu ndị e ji nkume wuo—ma gbuo ọtụtụ ndị e gburu mgbe ihe owuwu ndị a dara
Ala ọmajiji Tangshan nke 1976, nke gburu n'etiti mmadụ 240,000 na 655,000, bụ nke kacha egbu egbu na narị afọ nke 20.
Ala ọmajiji nke Chile nke 1960 bụ ala ọma jijiji kachasị ukwuu nke a tụrụ na seismograph, ruru ogo 9.5 na 22 Mee 1960
Ebe etiti ya dị nso na Cañete, Chile
Ike ewepụtara dị ihe dị ka okpukpu abụọ nke ala ọmajiji nke ọzọ kachasị ike, ezigbo mmaji Friday (27 Maachị 1964), nke gbadoro ụkwụ na Prince William Sound, Alaska
Ala ọmajiji iri kacha ukwuu e dekọrọ bụ ala ọma jijiji megathrust; Otú ọ dị, n'ime iri ndị a, nanị ala ọmajiji nke 2004 Indian Ocean bụ otu n'ime ala ọma jijiji kacha egbu egbu na akụkọ ihe mere eme.

Ala ọmajiji nke butere ọnwụ kacha njọ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ dị ike, na-egbu egbu n'ihi na ha dị nso n'ebe ndị mmadụ bi ma ọ bụ n'oké osimiri, bụ ebe ala ọmajiji na-ebutekarị mbufịt nke nwere ike ibibi obodo ọtụtụ puku kilomita site n'ebe ahụ
Mpaghara ndị kacha nọrọ n'ihe ize ndụ maka nnukwu ọnwụ nke ndụ gụnyere ndị ebe ala ọma jijiji na-adịkarị ụkọ mana dị ike na mpaghara dara ogbenye
Amụma ala ọma jijiji bụ ngalaba sayensị nke seismology metụtara nkọwapụta oge, ọnọdụ, na ịdị ukwuu nke ala ọma jijiji n'ọdịnihu n'ime oke ekwuputara
E mepụtala ọtụtụ ụzọ maka ịkọ oge na ebe ala ọma jijiji ga-eme
N'agbanyeghị mgbalị siri ike nke ndị ọkà mmụta seismologists gbalịsie ike, a pụghị ime amụma ndị sayensị nwere ike imepụtaghachi ruo otu ụbọchị ma ọ bụ ọnwa.
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewerekarị amụma dị ka ụdị amụma, amụma ala ọma jijiji na-adịkarị iche na amụma ala ọmajiji
Ịma amụma ala ọma jijiji na-emetụta ntule nke puru omume nke ihe egwu ala ọmajiji izugbe, gụnyere ugboro na oke ala ọmajiji na-emebi ihe n'otu mpaghara n'ime afọ ma ọ bụ iri afọ
Maka mmejọ ndị a ghọtara nke ọma, enwere ike ịkọwa ihe gbasara puru omume na akụkụ nwere ike ịgbawa n'ime iri afọ ole na ole sochirinụ.

E mepụtala usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị nke ala ọma jijiji nke nwere ike inye ọkwa mpaghara banyere ala ọma jijiji na-aga n'ihu, ma tupu elu ala amalitela ịkwaga, nwere ike ikwe ka ndị nọ n'ime usoro ahụ nwee ike ịchọ ebe obibi tupu enwe mmetụta ala ọma jijiji ahụ.
Ebumnuche nke injinia ala ọma jijiji bụ ibu ụzọ hụ mmetụta ala ọma jijiji nwere na ụlọ na ihe owuwu ndị ọzọ na imepụta ihe owuwu dị otú ahụ iji belata ihe ize ndụ nke mmebi
Enwere ike gbanwee ihe owuwu dị ugbu a site na ntugharị seismic iji kwalite nguzogide ha na ala ọmajiji
Ịnshọransị ala ọma jijiji nwere ike inye ndị nwe ụlọ nchebe ego megide mfu ndị sitere na ala ọmajiji
Gọọmenti ma ọ bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ nwere ike were usoro nlekọta ihe mberede mee ihe iji belata ihe egwu na ịkwado maka nsonaazụ.

Ọgụgụ isi nwere ike inye aka n'ịtụle ụlọ na ịhazi ọrụ ịkpachara anya: usoro ọkachamara nke Igor bụ akụkụ nke ụlọ nyocha ekwentị na-akwado usoro ndị na-eduga na nyocha nke seismic nke ụlọ ndị na-ewu ụlọ na atụmatụ nke imegharị ọrụ na ha
E tinyela ya nke ọma iji nyochaa ụlọ dị na Lisbon, Rhodes, Naples.

Ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwekwara ike ịme usoro njikere dị ka ichekwa ihe ndị na-ekpo ọkụ mmiri na ihe ndị dị arọ nwere ike imerụ mmadụ ahụ, ịchọta ebe a na-emechi emechi maka ụlọ ọrụ, na ịkụziri ya ihe ha ga-eme mgbe ịma jijiji malitere
Maka mpaghara dị nso na nnukwu mmiri, ịdị njikere ala ọma jijiji gụnyere ohere nke mbufịt nke nnukwu ala ọma jijiji kpatara.

Malite n’oge ndụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris bụ́ Anaxagoras na narị afọ nke ise TOA ruo na narị afọ nke 14 OA, a na-ekwukarị na ala ọma jijiji sitere na “ikuku (vapors) dị n’oghere dị n’ụwa.” Thales nke Miletus (625-547 TOA) bụ naanị onye edere nke kwenyere na ọ bụ esemokwu dị n'etiti ụwa na mmiri kpatara ala ọma jijiji
Echiche ndị ọzọ dị, gụnyere ndị ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris Anaxamines' (585-526 TOA) nkwenkwe na mkpirisi nhụsianya nke nkụchi na mmiri mmiri kpatara ọrụ seismic
Onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Gris bụ Democritus (460-371 TOA) boro mmiri n'ozuzu ya ụta maka ala ọma jijiji
Pliny the Elder kpọrọ ala ọmajiji “igwe ojii n'okpuru ala”.
Na akụkọ ifo Norse, a kọwara ala ọma jijiji dị ka mgba ime ihe ike nke chi Loki
Mgbe Loki, chi nke ajọ omume na esemokwu, gburu Baldr, bụ chi nke ịma mma na ìhè, a tara ya ahụhụ site n'iji agwọ na-egbu egbu kee ya n'ọgba ahụ n'elu isi ya na-asọpụta nsị

Nwunye Loki, Sigyn, ji nnukwu efere guzoro n'akụkụ ya iji jide nsi ahụ, mana mgbe ọ bụla ọ ga-awụsa efere ahụ nsi na-asọsa n'ihu Loki, na-amanye ya ịkwapụ isi ya wee tie agbụ ya, nke mere ka ụwa maa jijiji.
Na akụkọ ifo ndị Gris, Poseidon bụ ihe kpatara na chi nke ala ọma jijiji
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ ọjọọ, o ji ụzọ atọ tie ala, kpata ala ọma jijiji na ọdachi ndị ọzọ
O jikwa ala ọma jijiji taa ahụhụ na ime ka ụjọ jide ndị mmadụ dị ka imegwara.
Na akụkọ ifo ndị Japan, Namazu (鯰) bụ nnukwu anụ ọhịa na-akpata ala ọma jijiji
Namazu bi n'ime apịtị dị n'okpuru ụwa, chi Kashima na-echekwa ya nke na-eji nkume jide azụ ahụ
Mgbe Kashima kwere ka onye nche ya daa, Namazu na-ama jijiji, na-ebute oke ala ọma jijiji.
N’ọdịnala ndị na-ewu ewu n’oge a, a na-eji ihe atụ nke ala ọma jijiji eme site n’icheta nnukwu obodo ndị a tọgbọrọ n’efu, dị ka Kobe na 1995 ma ọ bụ San Francisco na 1906
Ala ọma jijiji akụkọ ifo na-adakarị na mberede na-enweghị ịdọ aka ná ntị

N'ihi nke a, akụkọ banyere ala ọma jijiji na-amalitekarị site na ọdachi ahụ ma lekwasị anya na nso nso a, dị ka na Short Walk to Daylight (1972), The Ragged Edge (1968) ma ọ bụ Aftershock: Ala ọma jijiji na New York (1999)
Otu ihe atụ pụtara ìhè bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Heinrich von Kleist kpochapụrụ, Ala ọmajiji na Chile, nke na-akọwa mbibi nke Santiago na 1647
Mkpirisi akụkọ ifo nke Haruki Murakami Mgbe ala ọmajiji ahụ gasịrị, gosipụtara nsonaazụ nke ala ọmajiji Kobe nke 1995.

Otu ala ọma jijiji kachasị ewu ewu na akụkọ ifo bụ echiche "Big One" a na-atụ anya na California San Andreas Fault otu ụbọchị, dị ka e gosiri na akwụkwọ akụkọ Richter 10 (1996), Goodbye California (1977), 2012 (2009) na San Andreas (2015) n'etiti
ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Akụkọ mkpirisi akwụkwọ akụkọ Jacob M
Appel nke ọtụtụ ebe, A Comparative Seismology, gosipụtara onye na-ese ihe na-eme ka otu agadi nwanyị kwenye na ala ọma jijiji nke apocalyptic dị nso.

Ihe ngosi nke oge a nke ala ọma jijiji na ihe nkiri na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ụzọ ha si egosipụta mmeghachi omume mmetụta uche nke mmadụ maka nhụsianya n'ezie nwere ike ịkpatara ezinaụlọ na ndị ha hụrụ n'anya na-ata ahụhụ ozugbo

Nchọpụta nzaghachi ahụike uche nke ọdachi na-emesi ike mkpa ọ dị ịmara maka ọrụ dị iche iche nke ọnwụ nke ezinaụlọ na ndị isi obodo, mfu nke ụlọ na gburugburu ebe ama ama, na ọnwụ nke akụrụngwa na ọrụ dị mkpa iji nọgide na-adị ndụ

Karịsịa maka ụmụaka, ndị okenye na-ahụ maka nlekọta doro anya nwere ike ichebe, na-azụ ha, na uwe ha mgbe ala ọma jijiji gasịrị, na inyere ha aka ịghọta ihe dakwasịrị ha egosiwo ọbụna ihe dị mkpa maka ahụ ike mmetụta uche na anụ ahụ ha karịa
ihe dị mfe inye ihe

Dị ka a hụrụ mgbe ọdachi ndị ọzọ metụtara mbibi na ọnwụ nke ndụ na ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi ha, nke a na-ahụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na ala ọma jijiji nke Haiti 2010, ọ dịkwa mkpa ka ọ ghara imebi mmeghachi omume nke ọnwụ na nchụpụ ma ọ bụ nkwụsị nke nchịkwa na ọrụ gọọmentị, kama iji kwado ya
mmeghachi omume ndị a, iji kwado nsogbu na-edozi nsogbu na ntụgharị uche maka otu mmadụ nwere ike isi meziwanye ọnọdụ ndị ọ metụtara.
